Posts.Content: Because we cannot scrub our inner body we need to learn a few skills to help cleanse our tissues, organs, and mind. This is the art of  self healing form nature, itself cancer of any sort in a posione to these inner body tissuse, think of a cut on your leg if not treated well it leds to titanouse which also cause death. but with cancer  as its has been called it also a cut but an inner cut and the thrick is you cant see what happends inside you so we keep cuts for years that affects the inner organs that casuse it to malfunction, then they call it cancer but here is what i leaned in my hard years . that you have to wahct out for we put inside our systems forgget you only live onces lifestely thing. bottom line i helped myself got healed with herbs that i later gae to others and it has worked for them too i dont know who is here but i want someone to feel happy agian i want every one here with cancer to get well so i will share with you send me a private message with your details i will prepare a something that you wont forget.
